there

amal supporters about the investigation
into the port blast they want to see the
judge judge tariq bitter removed as the

shia politicians when he's calling

there was some some chanting there was

the detritus of what went on earlier

the
the windows have been shot out of

where the main apartment window
floor-to-ceiling window had been shot

and and obviously it's very fluid it

it is i mean there's been some very

we're on the edge of badaro and it's

and it will suggest that it's closer
